Class BedRoom

  • java.lang.Object
    • Room
      • BedRoom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOperatingCost, IRoom

    public class BedRoom
extends Room
implements IOperatingCost
    This class simulates a bedroom.
    Author:
    Shreyas Bhat

      • use

        public void use(java.lang.String name)
        In a bed room, you can use the appliance "AC" and furniture "Bed". Using the AC will lead to increase in the electricity bill, while using the Bed will allow the occupant to sleep.
        Usage for this method is: 1. For AC:
        • If the AC is off, turn it on and increment the electricity by 10 * volume of the room.
        • Otherwise if the AC was on, turn it off.
        2. For Bed:
        • If the occupant is awake, then make the occupant sleep.
        • Otherwise if the occupant is already asleep, then wake up.
        No other appliances / furnitures can be used in the bed room.
        Specified by:
        use in interface IOperatingCost
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the appliance / furniture.
